report.title: Samples List for npms_sample_occurrences form
report.description: Used by the Samples grid to retrieve the samples associated with a survey and user. User can be identified by their Indicia User ID. A second sample may be linked to a first sample, the id of which is stored in a custom attribute. The id of that custom attribute is passed as a parameter to the report.
report.query: WITH samples1 AS ( SELECT s.id as sample_id1, COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || l.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || l.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , s.location_name, s.entered_sref) as location_name, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type FROM samples s JOIN locations l ON l.id = s.location_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName on lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=l.id AND lavPlotName.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttPlotType on ttPlotType.id = l.location_type_id JOIN terms termPlotType on termPlotType.id = ttPlotType.term_id JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id = s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND sav.int_value = 0 #joins# WHERE s.survey_id = #survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.created_by_id = #iUserID# ), samples2 AS ( SELECT s.id AS sample_id2, sav.int_value AS sample_id1 FROM samples s JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id = s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND sav.int_value != 0 WHERE s.survey_id = #survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.created_by_id = #iUserID# ) SELECT s1.*, s2.sample_id2, CASE WHEN sample_id2 IS null THEN true ELSE false END AS done1, CASE WHEN sample_id2 IS null THEN false ELSE true END AS done2 FROM samples1 s1 LEFT JOIN samples2 s2 ON s2.sample_id1 = s1.sample_id1 #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Indicia User ID: use 0 to ignore

param.name: s1AttrID
param.description: The ID of the sample attribute that links a second sample to a first

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label
